messages.title: Competent leadership that will deliver for our country

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Job creation and reducing the deficit are priorities.
Increase the NHS budget and build a strong economy to ensure a bright future for the NHS.
Create more school places, lift the cap on university places and help young people gain skills.
Deliver on house-building and create a property-owning democracy.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A vote for any other party risks letting Labour in through the back door.

issues.economy: Simon has a strong record of delivery on the economy.
issues.education: Simon has a strong record of delivery on education.
issues.health: Simon has a strong record of delivery on health.
issues.immigration: Simon has a strong record of delivery on immigration.

housing.content: Deliver on house-building and create a property-owning democracy.

leaflet.personalStatement: Simon Kirby has a strong record of delivery for the people of Brighton Kemptown.

politicalExperience.achievements: Strong record of delivery on economy, education, health, immigration.

images.caption: Images showing Simon Kirby engaging with the community and performing various activities.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Your vote will make a difference.
